Name: No Lights
About the game: Master Studios' first game, is a game more focused on JumpScares With the Objective to Survive, No Lights will take you to a different experience. The objective of this game is to scare you, you will not wait, you will run ... A Guard against five demons. No Lights is a survival game that puts you in the place of a security guard. With cameras and few resources, you will be scared little by little. Just a linear story, if you want to know more, youâ€™ll have to go deeper =============== This game is not recommended for people with heart problems or pregnant women The experience does not have a save system due to the game time (1 hour), but it has much more content than that.
